data-text=\"Proportional Integral Derivative\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e calculation to the position I want in my limelight, momentarily if you want I can leave the code I made last year where it has this logic, I’ve already tried several things until replacing the limelight with models like the 4 and 2, but nothing
